explains: adj. 酒精的，含酒精的；酒精中毒的，酗酒的；喝酒引起的，由酒精引起的
wordGroup: alcoholic fermentation [化]酒精发酵，乙醇发酵
alcoholic liquor [医]醇制溶液；含醇液
alcoholic extract 酒精提出物，酒精萃取物
alcoholic solution n. 醇溶液；酒精溶液

sentences.en: Alcoholic beverages are served in the hotel lounge.
sentences.cn: 宾馆的休息室供应酒类饮料。

sentences.en: The serving of alcoholic drinks was forbidden after six o'clock.
sentences.cn: 在6点以后供应酒精饮料是被禁止的。

sentences.en: Novello says college students will spend $4.2 billion yearly on alcoholic beverages.
sentences.cn: 诺韦洛说大学生每年会在各种酒精饮料上花费42亿美元。
